All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    BotPlayer
    This class represents a type of player, a bot player.
    ChatBot
    This class represents a type of client, a ChatBot.
    ChatClient
    This class represents a type of client, a human ChatClient.
    ChatServer
    This class represents the multi-threaded server.
    Client
    This class contains the connection process of a client to the server, required variables to read/write to the server and their initialisation/closures methods.
    ClientRead
    This class deals with reading data from the server and displaying it to the user.
    ClientWrite
    This class deals with writing data to the server.
    Command
    A class in which each object represents a command.
    Coordinate
    An object of this class represents a 2-dimensional vector.
    CroppedMap
    This class represents the cropped map, the map that the bot uses to make decisions on their movement.
    DoDClient
    This class represents a type of client, a DoDClient.
    DoDUtility
    This is a utility class which stores methods which are required throughout the program
    GameLogic
    This class is the orchestrator and it interacts with all the other classes and combines them into a playable game.
    HumanPlayer
    This class represents a type of player, a human player.
    Map
    This class contains the map information, including the map name, gold required to win, and the map structure.
    MessageType
    Represents the type of message that should be sent
    Player
    This class contains information about a player.
    SenderType
    Represents the types of client that could connect to the server
    ServerClientHandler
    This class deals with handling with a single client connected to the server.
    ServerUserInput
    This class deals with the server user's request if they wish to close down the server.
    Utility
